mapper.insert: INSERT INTO MEMBER(ENO, STATUS, STATUS_TYPE, USER_PWD, USER_NAME ,PHONE,EXTENSION, EMAIL,ADDRESS, HIRE_DATE) VALUES( CAST(CONCAT(DATE_FORMAT(CURRENT_DATE, '%y'), LPAD(MONTH(CURRENT_DATE), 2, '0'), LPAD(right(last_insert_id()+10,2),2,'0')) as SIGNED), DEFAULT, 0, #{userPwd}, #{userName}, #{phone}, #{extension}, #{email}, #{address}, #{hireDate})
